website_summaries.verdict: Although not as effective at negating sags and dips as some, this cool gel mattress is efficient and well-ventilated.
pros: Open-cell design leads to greater ventilation
cons: because of this, it cannot completely "undo" all sags and dips

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Topper
customer_reviews.text: I've had a couple of memory foam toppers, and this is my favorite. My first toppers were 4" deep, and while I loved that they nestled me and I sunk into a deep sleep, you can't wrap half of your body in foam an not over-heat. The 2" topper brings me the comfort I need to make my old Tempurpedic comfy, but the lower profile and ventilation keep me from over-heating. I have this topper on two beds in the house now. I opened it and allowed it to breathe for a few days - they all have that new foam smell to some extent, but this one goes to neutral really fast.
customer_reviews.author: Boisean

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for our travel trailer. It made a huge difference! We kept the mattress that came with the camper, but it is rock hard and thin (as all camper mattresses are). Rather than replace the whole thing, we opted to try a topper first. We are not young, and really need a good mattress for our tired, old backs. If you are on the fence about this, don't hesitate. Add a couple of really good pillows to this topper, and you will get a good night's sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria G.

customer_reviews.title: Very little smell.  Quite comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Very little smell. Quite comfortable. Have been using for a while now, seems durable and no change in comfort. I have a fairly sensitive nose and the smell was acceptable (essentially zero) after week of airing out. I could see some people not minding the smell after a day. Our other mattress has a 3" thick memory foam of the same type. In hind sight, I think the 3" is the slightly better way to go. I am considering getting another 2" piece of memory foam and putting it on top of this one. (Not REALLLLY necessary. It is nice as it is but having the nicer one makes this one "only" "very nice, quite comfortable" rather than "ahhhhhhhhhhh".)
customer_reviews.author: NickNameDrSciWayne

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS. We received this package in March, it fluffed in 24 hours and a couple of days later the foam smell was gone, just as promised. After reading great reviews we decided to buy since my boyfriend has back pain. 3 months later we are throwing it in the trash. Unless you’re a back sleeper this will increase pain and my boyfriend now has to see a doctor because he’s experiencing numbness in his pinky toe. Don’t do it!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: MATTRESS TOPPER DIDN'T LAST ONE SEMESTER
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this mattress topper for my daughter's dorm bed. The quality and firmness seemed fabulous upon receipt and, while my daughter does say that it's very comfortable, the topper has completely split within 12 weeks and needs to be replaced. My daughter is tiny and keeps her room immaculately, so it doesn't bear a lot of weight, it's cared for properly, and there's no reason that this product should have worn so poorly in such a brief amount of time. I'm hopeful that it will be replaced by the manufacturer/seller and I'll update this review upon resolution.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Jordyn

customer_reviews.title: Pick this one
customer_reviews.text: Ive purchased a few, mostly gel memory foam pads. I bought this for my bf's cottage that has an older mattress that put his back in traction every time he slept on it. This saved from buying a new mattress for sure - super comfortable! I also used it on my pullout couch that I've been stuck on for the past few weeks waiting for a bedroom Reno to finish and the difference is amazing. I'm now ordering one for my bed to go on top of what I used to think was a comfortable mattress before sleeping on this pad. Seriously, it's no gimmicks, fancy colors swirled in or lavender enfused...just simple and seriously comfortable foam.
customer_reviews.author: Kimber

customer_reviews.title: Great foam. Didn't use it for a bed
customer_reviews.text: Great foam. Didn't use it for a bed, but it also didn't smell like other people said that it did. Would buy again especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Foam Will Oxidize and Discolor Within 12 Months...so be prepared for that.
customer_reviews.text: It's not necessarily a bad product, but it is made of foam and although it looks really nice when new it will begin to oxidize and discolor within a year of use even in the best conditions (see pictures).
customer_reviews.author: Judicious

customer_reviews.title: not memory foam, just foam
customer_reviews.text: One star since I thought this was memory foam. This is just foam. If you push your hand in it it doesn't leave a handprint for even one second. I could see the value of this for people who want foam padding but I wanted memory foam and feel like I was duped. That is a lot of money to spend on something I can't return and doesn't meet the description.
customer_reviews.author: M. Otto

customer_reviews.title: but it is still fairly comfortable. It probably needs to be firmer to keep ...
customer_reviews.text: It's firmer than I thought it would be, but it is still fairly comfortable. It probably needs to be firmer to keep shape. It's a fine topper, not amazing, but good for the price. The color is a nasty yellow and it takes a few days for the plastic smell to go away *Update- Its been a few weeks since I wrote my review, so I wanted to give an update. This topper is really comfortable, I used to have back problems because my mattress is so hard. After sleeping on this for a few weeks, everything is so much better. No back pain, and I feel like I'm sleeping deeper.
customer_reviews.author: Kcox

customer_reviews.title: Bulky and unwieldy
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like this product at all. It was heavy and bulky, and difficult to store. It was fine for the first few days of just airing it out. Then, upon storing it in a closet, it ripped -- I think from the sheer weight of itself. It came shrink-wrapped, in a box roughly the size of 18" x 10". Trying to send it back was a nightmare. No way I could get it back to that size to fit in a box. Way too spongy and bulky. So I just gave up. Waste of my hard-earned money.
customer_reviews.author: Sue J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but 4 in. too thick if you have back issues, go lower
customer_reviews.text: This is comfortable if you like to sink down in a mattress a lot. I read to get 3 in. for back issues and went ahead and went with 4 in. I laid on it for two hours and had to give to our daughter. We sunk down in too much. So if you have back issues dont go with 4 in. do 3 or even 2. I think we are going to try the 2 in. Overall all softness is amazing though and the memory foam filled out within an hour and low order was even gone. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Cloud soft!!
customer_reviews.text: BEST memory foam! DO open in a well ventilated room. I opened my in the living room and left for 24 hours. I don't wish to breath the gassing off... I don't care that they say it's harmless. We really don't know. This pad will make the HARDEST mattress feel like a dream! Highly recommend! (DO NOT buy the pads that have layers - the aren't as soft - this is ONLY memory foam.)
customer_reviews.author: Lifelong Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: I love my bed now
customer_reviews.text: I love my bed now! This memory foam mattress really made my firm bed more comfortable. I will say that it does make a little bit of heat, but not bad and I love how rested my body feels in the morning now. Very comfy and I'm so glad I got it. I am planning to purchase another one for our guest room!
customer_reviews.author: Jan L.

customer_reviews.title: Turned to mush in 8-10 weeks
customer_reviews.text: After 10 weeks of use on top of a firm 8" base foam, there is zero memory and zero support. I am 165lbs my wife is 120lbs, this is not memory foam ( we have been sleeping on memory foam for 10 years) this is foam mush. When we get close we roll into each other. Amazon only allows 30 day returns( so over Amazon) now it's off to write the manufacturer. How I miss the local retail stores, I hope I am not alone.
customer_reviews.author: Bubass

customer_reviews.title: The best topper I have ever tried!
customer_reviews.text: I love the topper it is much better then the polyurethane topper. I have a TempurPedic mattress and used a polyurethane 2-inch topper- I started having tremendous low back pain and hip pain and could barely roll over and get out of bed in the morning. I threw away the polyurethane topper and put the lucid 4 inch memory foam topper on top of my old Tempur-Pedic bed. I slept like a baby and had no low back pain or hip pain!!!
customer_reviews.author: LMT

customer_reviews.title: Too spongy-no support
customer_reviews.text: This was the most uncomfortable mattress topper we have ever slept on. We purchased the medium firm hoping that it would give us more support and alleviate back and hip pains. The topper was so spongy that we just sank and could barely turn over. It was the worst night’s sleep ever. The next morning our aches and pains were worse than ever. We took it right off the bed and packed it for return. The battle to pack the topper back into the box is another story!
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: It is nice, and plush
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this solely for the comfort of the dogs while riding in my new new Outback. The double size fit perfectly. I then covered it with a quilt. It is nice,and plush, and very comfy. Most of the SUV cargo cushion don't provide the coverage. The dogs just get in and stay put. For all of you Outback dog lovers please consider this, especially those with big dogs ( I have a St Bernard plus 2 other dogs). I suspect it would have the same effect on a bed especially for those that love a soft plush feel.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Webster

customer_reviews.title: saved our sore backs
customer_reviews.text: Our mattress is pretty hard, and my husband and I were waking up with sore backs. I have some back problems anyways, and had even started sleeping in the guest bed. I'm so glad we ordered this. When it arrived, it was really compressed, and I had my doubts, but I let it sit out the full 48 hours recommended, and it really expanded! When we first put it on the bed, I stretched out and felt the soreness slowly fade away from my back. What a great feeling.
customer_reviews.author: MarinC

customer_reviews.title: Good comfortable support
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a very good topper although we have only used it for 1 night. There was no discernible smell when we removed the plastic wrapping and it rose to the full 2 inches in about 4-5 hours. It is lightweight and easy to maneuver. We had a cover from a previous topper so we were able to use that on this one but it would be nice if it came with one. It provides good support but doesn't feel hard or uncomfortable. My husband is very fussy when it comes to change yet he was perfectly comfortable on the first night. Overall, I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Irecomments

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Been using it a for a couple months. Came wrapped good with no issues. Had no problem reflating. Very comfortable. Sleeping better. At first it is a little annoying when i lay down bc where I sit on the bed to before i lay down it dips so i have to wait for it to expand back out. Meanwhile I am lying and feeling like I could roll off the bed. Other than that. I love it. Takes pressure off my hips and lower spine where I have pain issues. Have not had any issue with losing it height so far. Would definitely recommend to someone with pain issues.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Brett

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with LUCID in my opinion.
customer_reviews.text: LUCID is my favorite brand of memory foam mattresses and toppers. I only buy them at this point. Super comfortable and consistent with each other. I bought the 6" mattress for a guest apartment a couple of years ago and my girlfriend bought an 8" for her house. I bought this one as a topper for guests to sleep on a fold out couch and now I find myself sleeping on it as a bed. Note that I do not like the 2" toppers (from any company). They just don't really make a difference to me on a bed or a couch. Spend a little more money and get 3" or 4".
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Gibb

customer_reviews.title: Made my bed feel like a new mattress
customer_reviews.text: My dog had peed on my mattress and no matter the cleaning products I used, I could still smell it because of my sensitive nose. Decided to see if a thick mattress cover would cover the smell and it did! I sleep very hot and was worried this would make me sweat, but it was just fine with my 100% cotton sheets. It makes my king size bed feel 1,000% more comfy and luxurious. It is important to let it fully expand. I’ve been using it for more than a few months and haven’t noticed any tearing or anything of the sort but that may be because I sleep alone so there’s not as much wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: pretty great actually
customer_reviews.text: I think i really like this topper.. I was super skeptic at first.. honestly I tried to cancel the order! but it was too late. I'm glad i got it tho, and i can honestly say, my sleepless nights have decreased substantially! I also haven't woken up with any kinks in my neck or my back which is the whole reason why i wanted one of these.. I understand that months down the road customers have issues with tears and the topper loosing its form.. I will update! but so far, pretty great actually!
customer_reviews.author: dillon peters

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend has wanted to buy this specific mattress topper because of the reviews he had read on here about it. Since we've added this to our mattress he has complained of worse back pain than before. I hated this topper from the moment it was set upon our bed. It offers no support and completely sinks and caves in. It wasn't until he started sleeping on the couch to avoid the back pain that I finally ripped this off the bed! Please learn from our mistake and do not think this is going to add support for your back, it sinks in and is incredibly uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: VERY comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very, very comfortable. My mattress is about 5 years old at this point, so the pillow top isn't as soft anymore. I'd wake up all night feeling very sore. This topper was one of the nicer, lower priced ones so I thought I'd give it a shot. Slept all through the night the very first night in forever. It's REAL memory foam unlike some others and this size still fits into regular sheets and provides plenty comfort to where I don't feel a thicker one is even necessary. Would definitely recommend. Would turn any uncomfortable mattress into feeling like those most amazing bed ever.
customer_reviews.author: Sosoo850

customer_reviews.title: Poor Construction - Rips at the holes.
customer_reviews.text: The box was in really bad shape when received. I opened the box and it looked the the mattress had been rewarded. The mattress was yellow with black marks on it. I removed the wrap to find that the mattreee was split in the middles where the holes were. Luckily Amazon gave me a full refund without having to try and stuff the damaged product back in the box. Very poor construction and packaging. I would not recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Heinz

customer_reviews.title: Great price and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to put over our cheap mattress that goes in our camp trailer. With our mattress alone I would wake up with back and hip ache. Now that we have put this memory foam my nights are much better and wake up without all the aches, and camping is much more enjoyable. This memory foam takes about three hours to air out and expand to its normal shape after you unpackage it. Very Comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lynnfeld

customer_reviews.title: This memory foam topper is forgetful and forgettable
customer_reviews.text: The price is right, but after only 8 weeks the foam in the hip and shoulder areas are noticeably less supportive than at the foot of the bed (where the foam hasn't had much pressure applied and is still like new). Usually even when any memory foam topper says a guarantee of 3 years or more I expect only 12 to 18 months of high quality sleep (Usually flipping or re-arranging the topper will buy a little more time). Unfortunately, I was surprised to have this topper lose it's "memory" after such a short period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas C. Clapp

customer_reviews.title: Goldilocks says - Just Right!
customer_reviews.text: We got this 2" topper for our RV mattress and after following directions and letting it air out and fluff for 2 days - it was ready to use. There was no smell at all and I am sensitive to smells. We had a 4" topper previously and I always felt that it was too soft. I would have to get out of bed earlier due to my hips aching. This one is perfect - not too hard or soft and I can lounge as long as I want!
customer_reviews.author: G.Bowman

customer_reviews.title: I can't say enough good things about this mattress.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this mattress about six hours to unfold fully. It has now been a week. The mattress went over an old couch I've been sleeping on for ten years. I'm a pretty sound sleeper, so I took the odd nights of tossing and turning as a given. Although this mattress is very, very comfy to lay on, nothing can describe the feeling of waking up in the morning and realizing you're significantly more refreshed and slept better. It's amazing. It's like getting a pair of glasses and seeing better. The smell is strong, but not unpleasant, and has aired out significantly after a week. It does not bother me. I associate it with good sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Maxim P.

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfect on a futon!
customer_reviews.text: I was going to buy a memory foam mattress for this new futon I bought. It has a real nice mattress but it killed my back after a while. I took a chance buying this mattress topper and I'm glad I did. I bought a queen, and had to cut it. A full probably would have worked. I have Zero back pain, laying, or sitting. I made a pillow from the excess I chopped works great. I would recommend to anyone. I did lay this on a bed for a couple days to let it fully expand. I think it only took a day.
customer_reviews.author: jT

customer_reviews.title: ... to use in our camper on top of the horrible flat mattresses that come stock
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to use in our camper on top of the horrible flat mattresses that come stock. Since camper mattresses are not true kings, queens, etc... we had to cut this down to fit. We used an electric carving knife, yes, like the one you use to cut your Thanksgiving turkey, and it did a perfect job. With this one top of the old mattress, it is like sleeping on a cloud. And that is a lot coming from me, because I have lots of back problems.
customer_reviews.author: Lydk2

customer_reviews.title: I was nervous to get something and not enjoy it, but the reviews convinced me to give ...
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous to get something and not enjoy it, but the reviews convinced me to give it a-go. I like to feel like I'm sleeping on a giant cloud and this definitely provides that feeling. After sleeping on it three nights I feel as though my back is already feeling better as well. PROs -Thick topper -Ventilation holes -Soft, yet supportive CONs -Had a strong smell, but it went away after 24 hours -Mattress is high so this provided a little too much height
customer_reviews.author: Kourtney

customer_reviews.title: Really good deal on a foam topper!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone else is complaining about a smell, but mine didn't have one. This will take a while to fully "inflate" if that's the right word, it comes very compressed in the box. I love how this made my bed feel, but if there is more than one person on the bed its hard to move around. I've had this for a month or two and it has maintained it's shape well. One issue to be aware of is hairs are somehow getting through my sheets and becoming embedded in the foam. Overall I am very happy, but in the future would like a more dense topper.
customer_reviews.author: JDT

customer_reviews.title: Too soft
customer_reviews.text: This 4” mattress topper is too soft. My body just sinks in when I sleep on it. I did placed this on top of my spring mattress. Now I hate all memory foam toppers and mattress. I also got a memory foam 10” mattress as a gift. Used it for 3 months and I hate it. Could not return it after 14 days purchased from Woot.com.
customer_reviews.author: C. M.

customer_reviews.title: I didn't smell anything but I don't have the greatest nose. Let it sit for two days and ...
customer_reviews.text: Ok, it's for the guest room but I tried it out. COMFY! I does fit with our mattress pad and sheets that I ordered that are deep pocked. I didn't smell anything but I don't have the greatest nose. Let it sit for two days and now the hard bed (supposed to be good for you back but I don't want my guests sleeping on a rock) is comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom who was complaining about her new mattress we just bought her being too firm. She loves the memory foam topper! Says it reduced her body stiffness and makes her bed much more comfortable. It was easy to put on. It is sort of awkward. It's heavy. But you have to unwrap it and let it breathe for about a day. The chemically smell went away quickly and it fit really well with the same sheets.
customer_reviews.author: JoePC

customer_reviews.title: Hot sleeper
customer_reviews.text: This mattress topper is very comfortable but it gets terribly hot, I've never had that problem with a mattress topper before. I purchased this to place on my newer pillow top mattress that I thought was giving me back pains. This did not help with the back pain either like I had hoped. I still wake up several times a night, and now I wake up super hot too. I can't blame this topper for my back pain, or my mattress, guess it's just me. Just adding that it didn't help relieve the discomfort for me.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Torn on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the first one that arrived was split nearly all the way down the middle on the fold. We boxed it back up and requested a replacement. The second one arrived quickly but it too had a tear on the fold before we even removed it from the packaging. I have returned it as well and will be like looking for a new option that is higher density and more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia R.

customer_reviews.title: Immediately started sleeping better once I started using this
customer_reviews.text: Immediately started sleeping better once I started using this. It seems to be holding its shape. I'm a fat guy, so that is saying something. the only thing I do not like is that I ordered a Queen sized mattress topper and it's almost as if I received a full. The reason I say this is that its about 2 inches short of reaching all the way across my mattress. Kind of sucks but you get what you pay for and I'm definitely sleeping more comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: LunarTriggz

customer_reviews.title: WAY too soft!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this topper in April of 2019 and by October my husband and I were both suffering from back pain. We switched back to our old topper and within a few days the pain was gone. This topper offers NO support and you sink inti=o it so much that it becomes very uncomfortable. Also it is definitely not cooler than one without the ventilation holes.
customer_reviews.author: C. Toy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Priced Great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to cover a queen size air mattress. It turned that air mattress into a really comfortable bed. I couldn't be happier. Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: GeorgiaDawg

customer_reviews.title: It certainly helps!
customer_reviews.text: makes an unbearable mattress bearable... if you can't afford a new mattress, buy this. I opened it out onto my bed around noon right when it was delivered, I let it expand, flopped it up and down a few times to get some air underneath and slept on it that first night... no issues.
customer_reviews.author: JulieAnnafromME

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome! I was waking up with a lot of ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! I was waking up with a lot of lower back pain every day, and the moment I put this on my bed I stopped having it. I honestly couldn't really feel a difference when I first laid on it and was thinking I would be disappointed in my purchase (it didn't feel softer, no sinking-into-clouds feeling like people often describe of memory foam, etc.), but when I woke up the next morning with no back pain I fell in love with it! It really did do wonders for my overall sleep comfort. I've had it for a year and no signs of any issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Turned to mush quickly
customer_reviews.text: 6 years later the material has literally turned to mush. It looks and feel like regular foam and disintegrats. I know there are products out there that has a ten year warranty. This thing comes with 3 years supposedly. I will buy the more expensive item at Costco with a ten year warranty instead and see if it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: at first i wast sure i would like it.
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived yesterday...at first i wast sure i would like it..as this was my husbands purchase, but i did sleep on it last night, had a great sleep. I just find it harder to roll over on oppsed to a regular mattress. I have read that people complain about the smell, i was expecting a nasty smell when i opend it, i could hardly even smell a thing, and i have a very sensitive sense of smell. We slept on it about 10 hrs after being aired out with absolutely no odor. So quite happy about that :)
customer_reviews.author: Mioria

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last long.
customer_reviews.text: It does have a funky smell to it. Many even after using this for 2 weeks I can still smell it. It does make my aging mattress more comfortable to sleep on. It was easy to put on. I did put a cotton mattress pad on top to help protect the foam topper from tears and stuff. But so far so good, except the smell. Update - After a year of use it is flat. You can feel where it still is fluffy and where it is most slept on. I expected it to last longer than a year.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca M

customer_reviews.title: Less pressure = better sleep
customer_reviews.text: I was having hip and shoulder pain at night. This topper has helped reduce the pressure on my shoulders and hips and I am sleeping much better. We were very careful unpacking and placing it on the mattress to prevent the foam from separating and had no issues. I suggest that you have help to support the topper when moving it. Once it’s in place on the mattress there is no problem. I did notice a smell right after unpacking but, it went away quickly. I haven’t noticed that I get any warmer through the night than I did without the topper.
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: NOT COMFORTABLE AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fr my daughter as she suffers with chronic back pain, from the description and reviews, I assumed it would provide a little comfort. The first few nights was great but once your body conforms to to the topper, it stays that way leaving the topper sunken in if you sleep on the same spot. it's horrible! It is making her back worse. She weighs no more than 120 lbs. I wish I could return it but too big to wrap back up and do so. People, don't waist your money! I will also be contacting the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Christine F.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay put!
customer_reviews.text: We have had the topper for just over a month. Although it's more comfort and support than our original mattress we only notice it when we are sitting, not lying. Maybe that's how it's suppose to be, this is my first mattress topper. It hasnt improved sleep or anything like that and it keeps sliding off the edges of our bed....but you can't just slide it back. You have to lift the whole damn thing and put it back in place. Frustrating to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: April Benck

customer_reviews.title: works great - but smells terrible
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time buying this foam top.. i have to say the smell wasn't nearly as bad as the first one. it went away in about 2 weeks.. i constantly sprayed tea tree and febreeze and made sure the room was well ventilated. the smell is very strong, but after that the foam top is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Milla

customer_reviews.title: Fair value
customer_reviews.text: I switch out mattress toppers on a firm mattress as often as I want/need. I love having an easily changeable and customizable sleep situation. Memory foam, latex, nothing, it's up to me. Plus, my mattress lasts forever bc the topper takes the wear. Just cover with a pad and fitted sheet. Never buy a mattress again. Topper is medium quality memoryfoam-ish. Not super contouring, but adds gentle, soft feel to firm surface. Fair value. Would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Gmonster

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Bought this when we got a new mattress in September 2018. By December it had a split in the middle. Not a good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel N.

customer_reviews.title: After a week
customer_reviews.text: Ordered yesterday evening and received this morning around 11 a.m. Open it and lay it on my bed and let it restore, less than 2 hours it is fully restored back. Laid on it for a short one, felt comfortable. Will find out how good it is after tonight. After a week of sleep, still love it. It is comfortable. No problem. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware! My "new" topper was definitely previously used and crudely repackaged.
customer_reviews.text: I recently ordered this mattress topper to try and fix a bad mattress. As soon as I saw the box I was concerned about the product. Upon opening and unrolling it I was disgusted. It was full of hairs and clearly not new. Attached are the pictures I took during the un-boxing. I can't even rate the comfort of the topper as I'm afraid to sleep on it, not knowing where it's been.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with purchase. Price was just right to help my little man be more comfortable. We have a cool ikea bed but the mattress, also from ikea, is only as deep as my finger is long (probably a lit the more). So lately he has been complaining it's not comfy for him. This added perfect depth so his sheet fits better now and the softness he needs. It was just as pictured, ventalated, no smell and the sizing was spot on. Doesn't hang off top bottom or sides. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Going on two months and it's still amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have been sleeping on this product for almost two months and it has seriously been the best sleep I've ever had. The new mattress I bought was far too stiff, so I knew I needed to get some kind of topper. I did a lot of research and ended up purchasing this product. I am so happy that I decided to go for this! I don't usually write reviews, but after spending two months on this product and having some of the best night sleeps ever I knew I had to say something. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My sheets fit my bed again.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time buying a memory foam mattress topper. I love it! I had no idea what I was missing out on! I will never be without one again. And my sheets for the bed now. I was delivered the wrong size mattress by a company who shall remain nameless and this topper brought everything all together and now I can sleep in comfort without my sheets getting tangled.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley R.

customer_reviews.title: We use this on top of the super thin mattresses in our pop up camper
customer_reviews.text: We use this on top of the super thin mattresses in our pop up camper. I thought nothing could make those beds comfortable but I was pleasantly surprised. It makes a HUGE difference and the price is totally worth it. And don't worry, the smell completely goes away; just make sure to air it out for a week or so before using it and you should have no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Coffey

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase of the year
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love. I was super skeptical buying this because I have never really liked memory foam because of how hard it is. I used to toss and turn all night and have horrible hip pain and now I don’t wake up AT ALL. I don’t find it to be hard at all. It isn’t like normal memory foam where to lay down on a rock and you sink. It’s soft but supportive. There was no strong smell when mine arrived. I haven’t been getting over heated at all. My mattress is only 4 years old and a pillow top so I bought the 2 inch and it’s perfect. I’m heavier set and it supports me.
customer_reviews.author: Josi

customer_reviews.title: Best around by a long shot.
customer_reviews.text: This a a wonderful 3 inch mattress topper; Excellent quality, I wish I had one for each of our beds; believe me we have bought many many through the years and none of them compare to the quality of this one. The old bones don't ache like they did before this purchase. very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jacquelyn

customer_reviews.title: Truly amazed!!!
customer_reviews.text: Only the first night...I never review this early. Huge difference in my sleep and most importantly when I woke up pain free. Not since my 20s. I'm in my 40s now. I will update this review if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Miller

customer_reviews.title: Caregiver Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: I am a caregiver for my 90 year old mom, she was complaining of stiffness in her back. Once l purchased this foam topper there have been no complaints of stiffness when she gets up in the morning. It is very comfortable, forms to your body and prevents bed sores. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Roz

customer_reviews.title: STOP!!!!!!!! DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: IF YOU'RE IN COLLEGE LOOKING FOR THE PERFECT TOPPER TO PUT OVER THOSE UNCOMFORTABLE BED DO NOT BUY THIS MEMORY FOAM MY PRESSURE POINTS SINKS IN THE BED AND I WAKE UP IN AWFUL PAINS. I HATE THIS TOPPER SO MUCH I AM THINKING ABOUT THROWING IT OUT SAVE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.author: Sunev

customer_reviews.title: worked great for us!
customer_reviews.text: We have a older queen mattress, no frame or box spring, and when I was younger, being so ghetto fabulous was fine lol But after 40 it was killing my hips and back, we took a chance and bought this while we save up for a bed set. It really honestly helped a lot. We've had it since early Feburary and it's still all good! Great way to stall for a tax refund etc and get way more mileage out of whatever you have. Chemical smell wasn't bad for us , just the very first night noticeable but not too bothersome. I've painted my nails at night or dyed my roots and smelled worse lol
customer_reviews.author: Jessica svensson

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a mattress that turned out to be too firm. I purchased this mattress pad is its so, so comfortable. It's very substantial and dense and thick. I have lower back pain but this pad completely supports my back and is very comfortable as well. No back pain now. It gently cradles my whole body like a cloud. I needed to buy a new pillow that is fluffier and supportive as well. I highly recommend this pad.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M. Fields

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: We got this to go on top of the stock mattress in our travel trailer. It made a huge difference and it is very comfortable. Could be a bit softer, but it is a huge improvement over the stock mattress alone!
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Side sleepers should purchase the 4 inch topper
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd mattress topper I’ve ever purchased and my first memory foam topper. I ended up purchasing the 2 inch topper which is one thing I do regret, while the 2 inches is very comfortable while sleeping on my stomach or back I dont beleive its enough for side sleeping. Ive noticed my shoulders will get pretty sore fairly quickly when trying to sleep on my side, Im 5’11 180 pound male. Other than that I love the topper and have no other complaints other than wishing I had purchased the 3 or 4 inch topper.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Packer

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress Topper
customer_reviews.text: We had to let it air out for a little while, but this is a great product! Combining this topper and quality pillows really helped relieve some long-term pain from spinal surgery and my constant back pain from picking children up at the daycare I worked at. It's also a lot more breathable than my last one. If you're considering it, just get it!
customer_reviews.author: H.A.

customer_reviews.title: Just a little piece of Heaven
customer_reviews.text: Perfection. I had a memory foam years ago. I had read you needed at least a 4" thickness to benefit from the foam. I bought it and loved it. Our home burned down and I finally was to the point of purchasing another for my new bed. Again, it's made everything better. Once you get used to the retained warmth, you'll sleep like a baby. No back or joint pain. It's a must have if you have restless nights and wake up achy and sore. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jasycace

customer_reviews.title: Sleep Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: Epic. That's it. Changed the way I sleep!! Stays cool, 2in is the perfect size. Had a smell to it when it arrived and was only about half an inch thick. Let it sit out over night unrolled and then hit it with some fabreeze (ya I butchered that spelling. Lol) and it puffed up to the full 2in and the smell was gone. Fits perfectly corner to corner on queen size mattress and doesn't move at all. Obviously you'll want to get a mattress cover. Get a pillow top cover and it's like sleeping on a cloud no matter the condition of your mattress.
customer_reviews.author: JRFlurry

customer_reviews.title: My bed is finally comfortable again!
customer_reviews.text: I am staying in my room at my grandmas for the next year or two while I finish school. I decided while I am here I only will need the twin size bed that was already in the room since I stay overnight at my boyfriends house alot as well. Buying a new mattress or bed seemed like a waste of money since i already have a very nice queen bed in storage. This pad has been a great alternative option and has made the older mattress on the bed like a brand new one!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Love this Topper!
customer_reviews.text: Oh....so tempting to stay in bed all day. LOVE this memory foam topper. I bought a new mattress which ended up being too firm. So I decided to try a foam topper. I am very satisfied with this product. Been almost a year now, and it has kept its shape perfectly and continues to provide comfortable sleep. Only thing I did was to add a mattress pad on top of it that helps keep me a little cooler at night. The memory foam tends to be warm during this hot summer, and this old broad needs some relief! Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Gillham

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Before buying this cover, I did not believe back and joint pain would magically disappear if you sleep on a good mattress. After I slept on this cover for one night, I could feel the difference, and believe it or not, I had more energy the next day. I bought the Twin XL, thinking it will be wider, but it turned out longer than than my standard twin bed. When I opened the package, It was folded in the middle along the width and it seemed like you need to make a cut in the middle. DON"T DO anything, just leave it for few hours, and it come to the final form on its own.
customer_reviews.author: Naas

customer_reviews.title: good, but not amazing
customer_reviews.text: Had really high hopes for this. I purchased for a very uncomfortable rv short queen bed. Well, it helps so my back and neck don't hurt so bad in morning but it is a little on the warm side for me and don't give me the support I'd hoped for, I prefer firmer mattresses, but for the price compared to some others I can't complain too much.
customer_reviews.author: Btim3

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I was about to spend $1700 on a new king bed with a memory foam topper after experiencing back and neck issues. This product really saved the day! It is both comfortable and affordable. I must admit I was concerned about the longevity of this and matresses with memory foam toppers in general. But I'll give this one the thumbs up, as I've had great sleep over the past couple of months with no observable deformation!
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: Happy customers!
customer_reviews.text: We are temporarily sleeping on a futon while having some repairs done in our house. This memory foam mattress top has made the futon much more comfortable. It was reasonably priced compared to many others. The 2" seems to be just fine. Also, we haven't had any problem with odors - something mentioned in other reviews. Overall, we're happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MaryS

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I Google this sooner?
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for two nights now. I have definitely noticed a change in my quality of sleep. My mattress is pretty firm and about 8 or 9 years old. I really want a new one but can't afford that just yet. So I got this topper hoping it would help with my recent restless nights and soreness in the morning from my current mattress. So far it has been great! The smell was completely gone after about 5 or 6 hours of it laying on my bed. So I didn't have an issue with that. Hopefully this will tide me over until possibly the Spring when I can get a new mattress. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: TAtlanta

customer_reviews.title: Hot!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time, expanded quickly, and I didn't notice any chemical smell like some of the other reviews. My two main issues are that it is quite firm, a lot more than I was expecting. It also makes me incredibly hot! I've never had this problem with my previous mattress toppers, unfortunately it didn't last the night. My skin felt like it was burning! It was weird! I was not sleeping directly on top of the mattress. I use cotton sheets and had a mattress protector.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: I only use this a few weeks a year, but have a VERY picky back that is used to sleeping on tempurpedic mattresses for the past 15 years. So far, I've been very happy with this topper and found it to be more comfortable than you would expect for the price. My mom is using the same on her bed (but her body is less picky than mine.... I've had two car accidents and back injuries), and she has been really happy with it for daily use as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bonjour Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful mattress topper - it comes completely compressed and flat ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful mattress topper - it comes completely compressed and flat and like the directions said - in 48 hours of letting it lie flat it had expanded to it's fully height. It's a heavy good quality foam topper and the bed feels heavenly. I actually put this on top of our waveless waterbed mattress because we were feeling like we needed more support. It is perfect and the bed feels so good I hate to get out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort says it all!
customer_reviews.text: I have never laid on anything this comfortable in all of my 57 years on this planet! The more comfort the more relaxing! Ibought this size just to test it, I bought another twin from another company and this Lucid mattress topper won hands down!
customer_reviews.author: lee calkins

customer_reviews.title: Made our bed even more comfortable than before
customer_reviews.text: Made our bed even more comfortable than before. My wife is less than 1/2 my weight and on our new foam mattress she would get a lot of pressure pains, but this pad is super squishy and cooling so we're both even more comfortable than before.
customer_reviews.author: J P.

customer_reviews.title: Everything i expected and more...
customer_reviews.text: The memory foam pad was everything the previous reviews said it would be. For three first time in a year I was able to sleep in my bed instead of the couch. The cylinder holes made the pad very bearable so I never became overheated. For the first time in months I have yet to wake up soaked from night sweats. I would recommend it to Antony looking to but a memory foam mattress pad.
customer_reviews.author: Becka

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased. We have a high quality mattress
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. We have a high quality mattress, but it is too firm. We used to wake up with sore shoulder and hip joints. Often my arm would fall asleep. Since we put this pad on the bed, we have the best bed in the world! Made a terrifically noticeable difference. It does put off an odor for 24 or more hours, so I advise airing it in another room before putting on your mattress. But the smell goes away completely eventually. We have had this on our bed for a few months already. So far, so good!!
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Came packed in a box and was fairly heavy and great quality. Upon opening, it will take a day or so to inflate so don't expect to jump right in.... It is also initially a little smelly (kinda like a nondescript chemical smell). That goes away in a couple of days. I put it on top of a foam type mattress and it is awesome! It's comfortable and soft but firm enough to reshape when your not laying on it. I have deep pocket sheets on the mattress and it fits fine. The only draw back is one that I have found with every topper I have owned...they seem to shift and require readjustmement as you change the linens.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too soft and hot!  We did manage to get it back in the box to return!
customer_reviews.text: We got the 4” king topper. Only tried it two nights. It’s almost impossible to roll over and move at all. We returned it right away. After rolling it on the floor as best we could and then rolling again from the end, while squishing and sitting on it, etc, we did it get back in the box. Amazing! It took two of us. Just want you all to know it is possible.
customer_reviews.author: CMK

customer_reviews.title: Great value for price!
customer_reviews.text: We received the memory foam mattress topper and let it 'breathe' for almost 24 hours. Put it on our bed. It's' queen-sized dimensions fit perfectly. Had no issues with our mattress (quite lofty) and topper fitting in our fitted sheet. Slept quite well and would recommend purchase of this product. Shipper and supplier fulfilled their obligations wonderfully. Would recommend Lucid for this memory foam topper to anyone who suffers from hip, shoulder pressure point pain. Hubby and I felt so much more refreshed this AM, after first nite on topper. Expect things to improve!! Maybe we will have a full 8 hours uninterrupted sleep in the near future!
customer_reviews.author: Sue Lau

customer_reviews.title: Really worked on my back
customer_reviews.text: I recently moved and gave up my foam mattress topper. After about three months in my new bed, my back started hurting, and that's when I realized I didn't have my foam topper. Purchased this one, and after about two weeks, my back pain subsided. I do rotate it every two weeks so it wears evenly. I had no issues with smells or part of the foam not rising. Good product. Thankful to be sleeping well once again. :)
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Harris

customer_reviews.title: ... for a little over a year now and I love it. It is very thick and VERY comfy
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for a little over a year now and I love it. It is very thick and VERY comfy! Some people complained of an odor when it is first opened, this is true. I did not find it to be overwhelming and seemed to disappear in a few days. Fair warning - you may have to purchase larger sheets as it adds a solid 1.5 inch to your mattress. I have a full but I buy full/queen sheets just to be safe.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Nice and dense
customer_reviews.text: Nice and dense, supportive, and thick as promised. Couldn't sleep without one if these on top of my "pillow-top" Serta mattress. I have a great quality mattress less than 3 years old but I'm like the "Princess and the Pea" story. I have to have lots of layers if padding due to an arthritic condition. This topper provides the best comfort money can buy and is still affordable.
customer_reviews.author: silver queen

customer_reviews.title: Very Dissappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the same topper years ago and finally needed a new one. I purchased the exact same topper, however this one was not what I expected. It must have been at a different factory, because it is not the same quality. I'm so disappointed I spent my hard earned money.
customer_reviews.author: MEK

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress Topper
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to improve the mattress on the king sized bed in our camper. Wow! It is fantastic. We were going on an 11 day trip and knew there was no way we could handle the existing mattress on our aging backs. This topper made all the difference. We slept great and pain free for the entire trip. Honestly, I think we slept better than on our very expensive pillow top mattress we have at home. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: jac6

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately it just isn’t working for us
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know why but for some reason it’s not working for us. We both have back problems and sleeping on our side we sink in. We’re not having a comfortable sleep and we wake up hot.
customer_reviews.author: Real customer - Fl

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you buy one without holes in it
customer_reviews.text: This pad has holes throughout the mattress with you fold it in half or fold it at all it will break
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my college son bed that came with the apartment, and he loves it. We bought another brand from Amazon, and it was horrible. My son pulled it off during the night because that's how bad it was. I went to visit him, and I fell asleep on his bad ​because that's how comfortable it is. The only problem that is no fault of the produce, it was too big. We fixed that by trimming the edges that were really easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: Lvnlocs4life

customer_reviews.title: Great for people 150lbs or less
customer_reviews.text: Feels great. Kept its shape so far. A little smelly out of the package. You do want to ventilate for a 2 days when you get this. Made our firm bed feel more like a medium. A great buy for the money. Keep in mind your weight in comparison to the thickness. I and my partner each weigh under 150 and it works like a dream for us. Heavier folks may not enjoy as much. This does tend to slide around over time, and just needs a quick adjustment every now and again.
customer_reviews.author: Giuliano Bruno

customer_reviews.title: After year and half, topper is no good too soft.
customer_reviews.text: I went totally by reviews. Came quickly, King size, easy to handle. My new mattress which we bought a year ago, was so hard, my shoulders and hips started to hurt, sore every morning. The first night on this I felt the difference. I am very pleased the price was so affordable. I have told friends about this. If anyone has questions about this item, we can't get into the email to answer to send out answer. we are working on it.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Rose

customer_reviews.title: Not very ventilated
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed in that I was looking for a "ventilated" foam mattress. This one may have holes, but I had to take it off our bed because it was too hot. I am hoping it will serve its purpose come winter when its cold out. But certainly won't work for the remainder of the year.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Darbyshire

product_meta.title: LUCID 3 Inch Ventilated Memory Foam Mattress Topper 3-Year Warranty - Queen
product_meta.description: Style Name:Queen| Size:3 InchThis 3" thick memory foam mattress topper will bring new life to any mattress. Open cell construction yields a longer lasting, more resilient foam that will not leave long-lasting body impressions. The soft, doughy consistency quickly conforms to weight and pressure. This mattress topper will help relieve neck, back and shoulder pain by reducing pressure points. This in turn helps to correctly align your spine by supporting the natural curves of your head, neck and shoulders. Hundreds of evenly sized and spaced ventilation holes improved airflow and breathability, Our unique memory foam formula is naturally resistant to allergens and dust mites. The 3-Year U.S. warranty provides increased peace of mind for your purchase.
feature_bullets: 3" Thick 100% premium memory foam mattress topper; ventilated for improved airflow and breathability
Naturally resistant to allergens and dust mites
Lucid memory foam formula offers superior comfort and pressure relief
Open cell technology prevents lasting body impressions
New foam scent is normal and will dissipate over the first 48 hours after opening; this product features a 3-year warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars5,359 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: 3-year limited warranty guarantees that your lucid mattress topper will be replaced, repaired or refunded at our discretion if it is deemed defective due to faulty workmanship or structural defects. The warranty does not cover normal changes in softness or resilience that do not affect the performance of the mattress topper. Small body impressions less than 1. 5 inches are normal and not covered under the warranty. The warranty applies only to the original purchaser. Abuse, stains on the cover or mattress topper, or uneven mattress, platform or box foundation support will void any warranty. Lucid shall not be liable for any consequential losses arising from the purchase, installation and/or use of this product. For complete warranty information go to lucidmattress. Com read before opening: carefully remove plastic packaging being careful not to cut through to the mattress topper. Place compressed mattress topper on a flat surface in a well-ventilated room and allow 48 hours for expansion. Due to the unique properties of memory foam, dimensions after expansion will vary; this is normal and will not affect the performance of your new mattress topper. New memory foam may initially have a slight odor; it is completely harmless and will dissipate over a short time with regular use.
